settings.title: Entry-Level $80 - $120k
settings.description:
• Introduction to Mining Guide

Gain a comprehensive overview of Australia’s mining industry, including key insights into its operations and opportunities.

  • Qualifications Guide

Discover the essential qualifications and certifications needed to kickstart your mining career in Australia.

  • Utility/Labourer Cover Letter & Resume

Receive a professionally tailored cover letter and resume specifically designed for utility positions in the mining sector.

  • First Day on Site Guide

Prepare confidently for your first day on a mining site with tips on what to expect, safety protocols, and how to make a great first impression.

BONUS FREE WHITE CARD (CPCWHS1001) Valid for work in Australia (All States) *Valued at $125*

settings.title: Career Growth $120 - $180k
settings.description:
Includes everything from the Entry-Level Package, plus:

  • Career Coaching Session with Detailed Follow-Up Report

Benefit from a 20-minute career consultation where we discuss your goals and obstacles within the mining industry. Post-session, you’ll get a detailed follow-up report with customised recommendations to propel your career forward.

  • 3x Custom Job Specific Cover Letter & Resume

Receive specialised application materials tailored for equipment operator positions, showcasing your technical skills and experience.

  • Interview Preparation Guide

Access expert advice on common interview questions and strategies to make a strong impression on potential employers.

  • 30-Day Interview Guarantee

We are confident in our services—if you don’t secure an interview within 30 days, we’ll provide ongoing support until you do.

settings.title: Mining Management 180 - 320k
settings.description:
Includes everything from the Career Growth Package, plus:

  • Executive Career Coaching Session with Comprehensive Action Plan

Engage in a personalised 60-minute one-on-one coaching session focused on your leadership aspirations within the mining sector. We’ll delve deep into your career objectives, leadership style, and strategies to overcome industry-specific challenges. Following the session, you’ll receive a detailed action plan outlining tailored steps to achieve your executive career goals.

  • Custom Management-Level Cover Letter & Resume

Obtain professionally crafted cover letters and resumes specifically designed for management and executive positions in mining. We’ll highlight your leadership experience, strategic accomplishments, and the unique value you bring to high-level roles.

  • LinkedIn Profile Optimization for Executives

Enhance your professional online presence with a fully optimised LinkedIn profile tailored for executive visibility. We’ll focus on showcasing your management expertise, industry influence, and making you more attractive to recruiters and industry leaders seeking top talent.

  • Advanced Interview Preparation Guide

Access expert advice on executive-level interview techniques, including how to navigate complex questions, present your leadership vision, and make a lasting impression on hiring panels and boards.

  • Professional Networking Mastery Guide

Learn advanced networking strategies to connect with industry executives, influencers, and decision-makers. This guide provides insights into building meaningful professional relationships that can open doors to exclusive opportunities.

  • 90-Day Interview Guarantee

We are confident in our ability to help you succeed. If you don’t secure an interview for a management position within 90 days, we’ll continue to provide ongoing support until you do.

  • Priority Support and Unlimited Revisions

Enjoy expedited service with dedicated support throughout your job search process. We offer unlimited revisions on all your documents to ensure they perfectly represent your professional brand.
